Uses of Interface
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.EventPublisher

  • Packages that use EventPublisher 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity
    Provides the classes necessary for Activity injection and autowiring.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the event framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.widget
    Provides UI widget classes.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.widget.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for UI widgets.

      class  InfinitumActivity
      This Activity extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.

      This Fragment extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.

      This FragmentActivity extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.
      class  InfinitumListActivity
      This ListActivity extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.
      class  InfinitumListFragment
      This ListFragment extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.
